text:
According to this bug, SetEnv was fixed to allow it to set PATH.

https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=43906

It looks like this change affects Apache 2.3.7+, but not the 2.2.x branch.  (I could be wrong about this.)

http://svn.apache.org/viewvc/httpd/httpd/trunk/CHANGES?view=markup&pathrev=965679

In Apache 2.2.22 I cannot set PATH with SetEnv.

If this is not going to be fixed in 2.2.x, could the 2.2.x docs be updated to document this limitation of SetEnv?

Thanks!
creator: mpb.mail@gmail.com
